JOB PURPOSE:Responsible for updating the regulatory credit registry system in accordance with governing regulations, and laws in order to ensure effective and transparent reporting. In addition to submitting daily and monthly I-score files in the form of electronic data files in accordance with I-score guidelines.KEY ACCOUNTABILITIES:Prepare & submit daily and monthly I-score files in the form of electronic data files in accordance with I-score guidelines.
Investigate and respond to I-score disputes timely and accurately.
Maintain current knowledge of I-score guidelines for proper reporting and responding to disputes.
Insert the ID/CR information, related parties & facility type to create CBE code for the new consumer clients.
Insert notifications of non performing customers on CBE Network.
Prepare official letters to CBE for amendments & closure of relationships.
Assists with regulatory queries & provides requested support & documentation. 
Extract reports from CBE Network to be used in validation and review process.
Support in conducting  full analysis for (GL) variances against monthly declaration balances and take the corrective actions in this concern before uploading on CIB link.
